title.rendered: Yatra.com offers / coupon code: Offer with Yatra SBI Credit Card

content.rendered:
Round the year discount – Rs.1,000 Off on Domestic Flights. Every time you use your Yatra SBI Credit Card, a number of benefits come your way, ranging from reward points to great discounts at Yatra.com.

Vouchers

As soon as you enroll with this travel card, you get Yatra.com vouchers worth Rs.8,250.

  • 2 vouchers worth Rs500 each for Domestic Travel
  • 2 vouchers worth Rs1,000 each for International Travel
  • 1 voucher worth Rs.750 for Hotel Bookings
  • 1 voucher worth Rs1,500 for Domestic Holidays
  • 1 voucher worth Rs.3,000 for International Holidays

Promo code : TRAVEL

Book your flight tickets with Yatra.com and get Offer with Yatra SBI Credit Card

Terms and conditions:

  • A customer can use the promo code 6 times during a single calendar year.
  • The offer can be used on any of the 3 products in any combination i.e. 2 times on domestic flights, 2 times on international flights and so on.
  • Every time you use your card, you get exciting reward points.
  • 6 Reward Points on every Rs.100 spent on Departmental Stores, Groceries, Dining, Movies, Entertainment and International spends.
  • 1 Reward Point on every Rs.100 spent on all other categories.
  • Reward Points redeemable for Yatra vouchers (1 Reward Point = 25 Paisa)

Other benefits

  • Fuel Benefits – 1% Fuel Surcharge Waiver across all petrol pumps. Maximum surcharge waiver of Rs.100 monthly, per card account. Transactions between Rs.500 and Rs.3,000.
  • Complimentary Air Accidental – Rs.50 Lakhs Air Accidental Cover for Primary cardholder when ticket is booked on Yatra using Yatra SBI Card
  • Anniversary Benefits – Get annual membership fee reversal from second year on annual spends of Rs.1,00,000 in the previous year
